name: You Got This (tynitoon)
description:
You Got This is a party game where up to 4 players will have to survive the longest time in a job by completing crazy tasks.

The game has only one level at the moment but we would like to have a wide variety of locations including a factory, a pool, a farm, a graveyard, a zoo, a hospital and even space.

For each level, a worker will convince you to replace him at work for one day.
